rows.label: qst102708_msg0001
rows.name:
You've come... State the
patient's symptoms.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0002
rows.name: ...A Man-Eater?

rows.label: qst102708_msg0003
rows.name:
An existence where a person
and a Blade have fused...

rows.label: qst102708_msg0004
rows.name: Interesting. I shall help.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0005
rows.name:
To think something I saw in old
documents during my time as a
military doctor actually exists...

rows.label: qst102708_msg0007
rows.name: Where is the patient? ...Invidia?

rows.label: qst102708_msg0008
rows.name:
I was a Superbian military doctor.
It's impossible for me to go...

rows.label: qst102708_msg0009
rows.name: However, he is half human.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0010
rows.name:
If you can handle the Blade's
adjustments on your end, I
will manage the human side.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0011
rows.name:
Details later. I will
make the medicine.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0012
rows.name:
Three Gloomwood Roots, one
Cloud Sea Rock Salt, and...

rows.label: qst102708_msg0013
rows.name:
If I had a root vegetable that tastes
vitalizing and seems to promise a long
life, I could make the perfect medicine.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0014
rows.name:
The gathering locations
are... Spirit Crucible Elpys
and the Cliffs of Morytha.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0015
rows.name:
The last root vegetable is unknown.
Ask my assistant for details.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0101
rows.name: Roots... roots...

rows.label: qst102708_msg0201
rows.name: Wonderful.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0202
rows.name:
There is one more thing
I need you to prepare.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0203
rows.name: Dragon Incense...

rows.label: qst102708_msg0204
rows.name:
However, from what I've heard
of the symptoms, the ordinary
kind will be insufficient.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0205
rows.name:
I need the high-purity
True Dragon Incense that
can be found in Invidia.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0206
rows.name: Obtain it for me.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0207
rows.name:
True Dragon Incense can be found in
the Dragon's Stomach in Invidia.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0208
rows.name:
Two pieces should be
enough for one adult.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0209
rows.name: Hurry, for the patient's sake.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0301
rows.name: What is Dragon Incense? ...Assistant!

rows.label: qst102708_msg0302
rows.name: Please ask him.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0401
rows.name: True Dragon Incense... Yes.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0402
rows.name:
I will decoct this, boil it with
the other ingredients, and stir
for three days and three nights.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0403
rows.name: ...I don't have enough hands.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0404
rows.name:
My assistant and I have
other work. It's difficult
to be at this constantly.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0405
rows.name:
You'll provide personnel?
...A great help.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0501
rows.name:
A Man-Eater... A fusion
of person and Blade...

rows.label: qst102708_msg0502
rows.name:
It's like the relationship
between me and roots.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0601
rows.name: A high-precision medicine is complete.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0602
rows.name:
It has the effect of aiding the
efficiency of circulatory functions.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0603
rows.name:
After adjusting the Blade's power,
it will provide a restorative effect
to the human parts... hmm.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0604
rows.name:
Explaining the details is a bother...
Just have him drink it immediately and
perform the Blade-side adjustments.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0605
rows.name: However, it is not a perfect cure.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0606
rows.name:
He will die eventually.
He is human, after all.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0607
rows.name: Now, go to the patient quickly.

rows.label: qst102708_msg0701
rows.name: A job well done...
